snippet: The team has qualified for the Olympics, but with little support from the Jamaica Olympic Association, it is trying to raise funds through donations.
abstract: Winter Sports Roundup; Jamaica's bobsled team qualifies for the Olympics, but with little support from the Jamaica Olympic Association, it is trying to raise funds through donations; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: The team has qualified for the Olympics, but with little support from the Jamaica Olympic Association, it is trying to raise funds through donations.

headline.main: Jamaican Bobsledders Seek Money for Sochi Trip
